alert.note: Alert for Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:44PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Aransas, Calhoun, southern Victoria, eastern Goliad and northeastern Refugio Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 643 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Schroeder to near McFaddin to Port Oconnor. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seadrift, Port Oconnor, McFaddin, Fannin, Schroeder, Indianola, Bloomington, Magnolia Beach, Long Mott, Coleto Creek Park, Green Lake, Oak Village, Tivoli, Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, Matagorda Island State Park and Austwell. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 646 and 654. US Highway 59 between mile markers 642 and 664. US Highway 77 between mile markers 582 and 612. US Highway 87 between mile markers 828 and 838. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
